errors.weakPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters

chatbot.title: Get Your Insurance Quote
chatbot.subtitle: Answer a few questions to get your personalized quote
chatbot.voiceNotSupported: Voice input not supported in this browser

questions.education: What is your education level? (High School/Bachelor/Master/PhD)
questions.income: What is your annual income (in KES)?
questions.homeValue: What is your home value (in KES)?
questions.carAge: What is the age of your car (in years)?
questions.carValue: What is your car's blue book value (in KES)?
questions.carType: What type of car do you have?
questions.carUse: How do you primarily use your car? (Commercial/Private)
questions.travelTime: How long is your daily commute (in minutes)?
questions.urbanicity: Do you live in an urban area? (Yes/No)
questions.kidsAtHome: How many children live at home?
questions.kidsDriving: How many of your children drive?
questions.yearsOnJob: How many years have you been at your current job?
questions.timeInForce: How long have you had insurance (in years)?
questions.claimFreq: How many claims have you made in the past 5 years?
questions.claimAmount: What was the total amount of your previous claims (in KES)?
questions.oldClaim: What was the amount of your oldest claim (in KES)?
questions.mvrPoints: How many motor vehicle record points do you have?
questions.revoked: Has your license ever been revoked? (Yes/No)
questions.speedingIncidents: How many speeding incidents in the past year? (Optional)
questions.harshBraking: How many harsh braking events per month? (Optional)
questions.aggressiveAcceleration: How many aggressive acceleration events per month? (Optional)

quotes.title: Quote History
quotes.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this quote?
